verses.text: A Song of degrees of David. LORD, my heart \add is\add* not haughty, nor my eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
Surely I have behaved and quieted myself as a child that is weaned by his mother: my soul \add is\add* even as a weaned child.
Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
